/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc  "--expt-relaxed-constexpr" --compiler-bindir /usr/bin/g++-7 -D__CUDA_NO_HALF_OPERATORS__ -D__CUDA_NO_HALF_CONVERSIONS__ -D__CUDA_NO_HALF2_OPERATORS__ -gencode arch=compute_61,code=sm_61 -O3 -DNDEBUG -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/spconv_utils.dir/all.cc.o -o CMakeFiles/spconv_utils.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8  libspconv_nms.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
